nodes.text: Doctor Aphra 5 is the fifth issue of the canon comic book series Star Wars: Doctor Aphra. It was written by Alyssa Wong, illustrated by Marika Cresta and Rachelle Rosenberg, and published by Marvel Comics on October 28, 2020. It features the story "Fortune and Fate Part 5: Power Play," in which Chelli Aphra and her team face Ronen Tagge in the city Canto Bight.

POWER TO RULE THE GALAXY? RONEN TAGGE has the legendary RINGS OF VAALE. Will he destroy the priceless artifacts or fall to their temptation?. If they truly give him the power to rival the EMPEROR, what hope do APHRA and crew have to stop him?
